name: Japnit K. Ahuja
desc: As Co-Founder, Japnit oversees all operations and is the head of the Singapore chapter The Girl Code. She’s pursuing computing at the National Junior College, Singapore.

name: Samriddhi Agnihotri
desc: As Co-Founder, Samriddhi oversees all operations and is the head of the Indian chapter of The Girl Code. She’s a student of The Mother’s International School, India.

name: Naman Sood
desc: As a web developer, Naman is in charge of front-end and back-end components of the website. He helped create the platform used by The Girl Code and manages the database. He is a student of The Delhi Public School Vasant Kunj, India.

name: Tishya Doraiswamy
desc: Tishya Doraiswamy creates all of the written content for our organisation, including articles for publications, curating information for our website and working on the Instagram page and blog. She is a student of The Shri Ram School,                India.

name: Vanaj Moorthy
desc: As a designer, Vanaj looks after the design of the website, the video editing, the illustrations and animation. He is a student of The Shri Ram School, India.

name: Srijon Sinha
desc: As a designer, Srijon looks after animations, illustrations, videos, and editing. He is a student of The Shri Ram School, India.

name: Sidhant Bhavnani
desc: Sidhant looks after the design, development and implementation of the curriculum. He is a student of The Mother's International School,                India.

name: Parth Sharma
desc: Parth handles the day-to-day of the Twitter, as well as maintaining the website. He is a student of The Shri Ram School, India.

name: Dhimant Ananmay
desc: Dhimant has worked on developing the curriculum and handles social media. He is a student of The Shri Ram School, India.
